text: Renault 4 was a car produced by Renault from 1961 through 1992. The model is seen as Renault's version of the Citroen 2CV, due to its rugged design and simple running gear, because of its long run, it was updated many times in its life. Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1960s automobiles Category:1970s automobiles Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:Renault automobiles
title: Renault 4
